text: @BorisJohnson Just your daily reminder that you're the WORST PM this country has ever had the misfortune to be cursed with. You're a national embarrassment, a compulsive liar, incapable of delivering a coherent message, and your laziness and fecklessness over #coronavirus has killed thousands.
